rComments: And is really nice, but his course needs a complete overhaul. He has spent over 40 years working in the Environmental Assessment system he is teaching. It is my opinion that he is far too entrenched in this system to adequately teach it to a layman. He does a very poor job of communicating what is important to learn. Awful class.

ANDY IS FANTASTIC. He knows his subject well, knows his students even better, and genuinely cares about creating a "real" learning experience. I'd sign up for any class he taught without a moment's thought.
